channel.title: Coldpkers [317] [pi]
channel.description:
This is my first ever real project and im hoping it turns out well... i got a blank pi source from my friend the only thing on it was the godswords and bandos and other basic armour and gear. I have only been working on this project for 2 days now and its only about 20% finished :P
----------------Updates------------------ -added all chaotic wepons and sheilds -added working spec attack for d claws -added extreme potions -added alot of treasure trail items -fixed all dupes -edited godwars -made capes move when u have godsword weilded (kinda like wind blowing on cape)
---------------------Credits------------------------ sanity : 70% (for now) for base my friend:10% for making a nice clean pi base me : 20% (for now) for adding and editing tons
-------------------pictures-------------------------

item.title: Coldpkers [317] [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

The name should be changed as it’s a bit immature, and to be quite honest; dumb. I’m not too much of a fan of the customs, and think it’s a bit too much. Good luck with the server though.

Read full topic

item.title: Coldpkers [317] [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I like the wind blowing the cape idea. Good luck. When you get a little further into the development contact me I will help test it out if you wish.

Read full topic

This is my first ever real project and im hoping it turns out well… i got a blank pi source from my friend the only thing on it was the godswords and bandos and other basic armour and gear. I have only been working on this project for 2 days now and its only about 20% finished
